Install VideoGen
=================

In order to install VideoGen on your machine, you need to download source code from `VideoGen's GitHub Website <https://github.com/perfidia/videogen>`_ or git repository.
If you already have python installed, the VideoGen is ready to use. For further instructions how to run VideoGen look into "Running VideoGen" section in documentation.

In order to install python on your computer, follow instructions from this link: `Python.org <www.python.org/getit/>`_
